unsupported.title: Unsupported browser

links.title: SUPINFO
links.description: SUPINFO offers advanced training in computer science with a Bachelor of Science (3 years) and a Master of Science (5 years) degree.

links.title: E-parcours
links.description: Create and manage your contract requests between SUPINFO and the companies involved in your college education path.

links.title: W3 Schools
links.description: W3Schools is a platform for learning, testing, and training your web developer skils, with tutorials and references.

links.title: JetBrains
links.description: JetBrains is a cutting-edge software vendor specializing in the creation of intelligent development tools.

links.title: Apple Developer
links.description: Join the Apple Developer Program to reach customers around the world on the App Store for iPhone, iPad, Mac and Apple Watch.

links.title: CodinGame
links.description: CodinGame is a challenge-based training platform where you can improve your coding skills with fun exercises.

links.title: Azure Portal
links.description: Build, manage, and monitor all your apps in Microsoft Azure Portal. A unified hub built for you, your team and your projects.

links.title: Office
links.description: Collaborate for free with online versions of Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and OneNote, right in the cloud.

links.title: VMware
links.description: Run any operating system on your device with VMware for modern OS virtualization, security & networking.

links.title: Vocareum
links.description: The Vocareum cloud labs - leveraging cloud infrastructure for learners to be a single click away from coding applications.

links.title: Root-me
links.description: Root Me is a platform for everyone to test and improve knowledge in computer security and hacking.

links.title: Netacad
links.description: Advanced networking courses that combine technical training and professional skills development.

links.title: The Security Blogger
links.description: Start reading the news feed of The Security Blogger right away!

links.title: CyberChef
links.description: The Cyber Swiss Army Knife - a web app for encryption, encoding, compression and data analysis.
